title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
summary: A young girl named Scout navigates the prejudiced Alabama society with her brother, Jem, and their father, Atticus, who defends a black man accused of raping a white woman.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
summary: An unwitting human, Arthur Dent, embarks on a bizarre space adventure after Earth is demolished to make way for a galactic freeway, accompanied by his alien friend Ford Prefect.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
summary: Young wizard Harry Potter discovers his magical heritage and faces numerous challenges, including the malevolent wizard Voldemort, during his first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Where the Wild Things Are
author: Maurice Sendak
summary: A young boy named Max sails to an island inhabited by ferocious wild creatures who crown him as their ruler, allowing him to unleash his wild side before returning home to the love of his family.
